00029 abstract class simbio
00030 {
00031     public $error = '';
00032     private $version = '2.0';
00033 
00040     public function showError($bool_die = false)
00041     {
00042         echo '<div style="padding: 5px; border: 1px dotted #FF0000; color: #FF0000;">';
00043         echo 'ERROR : '.nl2br($this->error).'</div>'."\n";
00044         if ($bool_die) {
00045             die();
00046         }
00047     }

00056     public static function colorSQLstring($sql_string = '')
00057     {
00058         // list of mysql reserved words
00059         $reservedwords = array(
00060             "\bDATABASE\b",
00061             "\bTABLE\b",
00062             "\bAND\b",
00063             "\bOR\b",
00064             "\bSELECT\b",
00065             "\bINSERT\b",
00066             "\bUPDATE\b",
00067             "\bDELETE\b",
00068             "\bALTER\b",
00069             "\bFROM\b",
00070             "\bWHERE\b",
00071             "\bLIKE\b",
00072             "\bORDER BY\b",
00073             "\bLIMIT\b",
00074             "\bUSE\b",
00075             "\bDESCRIBE\b",
00076             "\bJOIN\b",
00077             "\bLEFT\b",
00078             "\bRIGHT\b",
00079             "\bINNER\b",
00080             "\b=\b",
00081             "\b!=\b",
00082             "\bON\b",
00083             "\bIN\b",
00084             "\bAS\b",
00085             "\bNULL\b",
00086             "\bNOT\b",
00087             "\bIS\b",
00088             "\bINTO\b");
00089 
00090         // colorized the sql string
00091         $matches_str = array();
00092         preg_match_all("/'[^']*'/i", $sql_string, $matches_str, PREG_SET_ORDER);
00093         if ($matches_str) {
00094             foreach ($matches_str as $sql_str) {
00095                 $sql_string = preg_replace("/".$sql_str[0]."/i", '<strong style="color: green;">'.$sql_str[0].'</strong>', $sql_string);
00096             }
00097         }
00098 
00099         // colorized brackets
00100         $sql_string = str_replace(array('(',')'), array('<strong style="color: red;">(</b>', '<b style="color: red;">)</strong>'), $sql_string);
00101 
00102         // colorized the SQL reserved words
00103         foreach ($reservedwords as $words) {
00104             $sql_string = preg_replace("/$words/i", '<strong style="color: navy;">'.$words.'</strong>', $sql_string);
00105         }
00106 
00107         // remove regex special chars
00108         $sql_string = str_replace(array('\b'), '', $sql_string);
00109         return $sql_string;
00110     }
00111 }
00112 ?>
